title: The Pretender (restored, colorized) (1947, film-noir, imdb score: 6.4)

sources.title: The Pretender (restored, colorized) (1947, film-noir, imdb score: 6.4)
sources.description: The Pretender is a 1947  crime drama   film noir  directed by  W. Lee Wilder  starring  Albert Dekker ,  Catherine Craig ,  Charles Drake  and  Alan Carney .
